description: A compact, extensible and flexible structural framework for news, based on XML. It supports the representation of electronic news items, collections of such items, the relationships between them, and their associated metadata.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: NewsML 1
